videos.title: Best Reaper POTGs by Hooley, Pt. I

photos.alt: Holly playing guitar with a Santa hat inside of a blanket fort
photos.caption: It's my goal to build at least one blanket fort a year and play guitar in it.

photos.alt: Holly and her girlfriend, Blake, in formal attire outside of a wedding venue
photos.caption: Blake and I in our fancy attire just before a friend's wedding, in Denton, Texas, in October 2021.

photos.alt: Holly in climbing gear inside a climbing gym, with a thumbs up
photos.caption: I became an avid (indoor) climber in 2017. I don't climb as much now as I did then, but I do still go when I can.

photos.alt: Holly in front of the Washington Monument in Washington, D.C., with thumbs up
photos.caption: I lived in Maryland during 2017 and often visited D.C. I'm a big fan of that whole area!

photos.alt: Holly in Yang (from RWBY) cosplay in front of a cardboard cutout of the same character
photos.caption: Yang was my first ever cosplay. This picture shows my second version of a Yang cosplay, taken at RTX 2018.

photos.alt: Holly in front of the Hollywood sign in Los Angeles, California, in summer clothes with thumbs up
photos.caption: In the summer of 2019, a friend and I visited our former coworker in Los Angeles and explored all the fun touristy things.

photos.alt: Holly in front of Lake Michigan in winter clothes with a thumbs up and a Pokemon hat
photos.caption: In 2016, I visited Minnesota for a week in the winter. This picture was taken next to Lake Michigan.

photos.alt: graduation photo from University of North Texas, green graduation gown & cap, holding diploma
photos.caption: My UNT graduation photo, May 2015.

photos.alt: TSTC graduation photo, black graduation gown & cap, holding diploma, wearing medal and cords
photos.caption: My TSTC graduation photo, April 2017. I won a big award at this ceremony, the Mike Torres Jr. Leadership Award.

photos.alt: Holly in Central Park, New York, with a thumbs up in winter clothes
photos.caption: In 2017, I visited New York City for the second time. I was particularly excited to see the Balto statue again in Central Park.

photos.alt: Holly in Disney World with Donald Duck
photos.caption: I visited Disney World for the first time (as an adult) in the spring of 2016.

photos.alt: Holly in fall clothes standing in front of a highway sign that reads 'Entering Sappho'
photos.caption: I took a drive up to Washington State for my first visit in January 2021 (before I moved up here in 2022).
